abstract: Readers comment on my column about sexual violence, and I offer some ideas about how to help.
snippet: Readers comment on my column about sexual violence, and I offer some ideas about how to help.
lead_paragraph: My Sunday column reports on one of the front lines in the war on sexual violence: Sierra Leone. The civil war has ended there but the war on women and girls continues -- and that's a pattern all over the world. This has been a heartbreaking issue to report on, and I'm sure some readers will want to know how to help.

headline.main: Sexual Violence, and How to Help
